title: Technology-Integrated Mathematics Microlearning Design: Short-Intensive Course Based on the ASSURE Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and experience applying foundational mathematics in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Professionals learning immediately applicable mathematical skills via mobile devices in their workplaces, utilizing a flexible BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design math education modules optimized for mobile environments using the ASSURE model.
Learners can develop at least three evaluation tools (quizzes, simulations) for technology integration in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.
Learners can implement domain-specific (medical/legal/technical) math problem-solving strategies as mobile microlearning activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
